titleStmt.title: Duplyes of the ministers & professors of Aberdene to second answeres of some reverend brethren, concerning the late covenant.
titleStmt.author: Forbes, John, 1593-1648.

notesStmt.note: Signed by John Forbes and five others.
A reply to: The answeres of some brethren of the ministerie, to the replyes of the ministers and professours of divinitie in Aberdene.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
